Label: plant phenological trait
Text definition: A quality of a whole plant that provides phenologically relevant information about the whole plant.

Label: abscised plant structure presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of some plant structure that a whole plant has abscised.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes plant structures that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: seedling presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by whether or not a whole plant is a seedling.
Comments: For consistency with other trait measurements, seedling presence is also measured with a count, which must be a binary value: 0 if the plant is a seedling, 1 if it is not.

Label: abscised leaf presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of true leaves that a whole plant has abscised.
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes leaves that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised fruit presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of a whole plant's ripe fruits that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of ripe fruits on a whole plant that have abscised at least one mature seed.
Alternative label: presence of abscised fruit or seed
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes fruits or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus presence
Text definition: A plant phenological trait that is measured by the number of a whole plant's open megasporangiate strobili that have been abscised or removed by an herbivore and/or the number of open megasporangiate strobili on a whole plant that have abscised at least one mature seed.
Alternative label: abscised cone or seed presence|presence of abscised cone or seed|presence of abscised megasporangiate strobilus
Phenobase preferred label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus or seed presence
Comments: The number can be 0 or more and only includes megasporangiate strobili or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised plant structure present
Text definition: An abscised plant structure presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one of some plant structure has been abscised or removed.
Comments: This only includes plant structures that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised leaf present
Text definition: An abscised leaf presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one true leaf  has been abscised.
Equivalent to: (PPO:0002002 that RO:0000080 some (PO:0000003 and (PPO:0000005 some PPO:0001013)) and PPO:0000009 some (PPO:0000005 some PPO:0001013))
Comments: This only includes leaves that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised fruit present
Text definition: An abscised fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one ripe fruit has been abscised or removed by an herbivore or that has at least one ripe fruit from which at least one mature seed has been abscised.
Comments: This only includes fruits or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus present
Text definition: An abscised megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which at least one open megasporangiate strobilus has been abscised or removed by an herbivore or that has at least one open megasporangiate strobilus that has at least one mature seed that has abscised.
Phenobase preferred label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus or seed present
Comments: This only includes megasporangiate strobili or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised plant structure absent
Text definition: An abscised plant structure presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which none of some plant structure have been abscised or removed.
Equivalent to: (PPO:0002002 that RO:0000080 some (PO:0000003 and not (PPO:0000005 some PO:0009011)) and PPO:0000009 only (not (PPO:0000005 some PO:0009011)))
Comments: This only includes plant structures that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised leaf absent
Text definition: An abscised leaf presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no true leaves have been abscised.
Equivalent to: (PPO:0002002 that RO:0000080 some (PO:0000003 and not (PPO:0000005 some PPO:0001013)) and PPO:0000009 only (not (PPO:0000005 some PPO:0001013)))
Comments: This only includes leaves that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised fruit absent
Text definition: An abscised fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no ripe fruits have been abscised or removed by herbivores and that does not have any ripe fruits from which any mature seeds have abscised.
Equivalent to: (PPO:0002002 that RO:0000080 some (PO:0000003 and not (PPO:0000005 some (PPO:0001045 or PPO:0001024))) and PPO:0000009 only (not (PPO:0000005 some (PPO:0001045 or PPO:0001024))))
Comments: This only includes fruits or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus absent
Text definition: An abscised megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant from which no open megasporangiate strobili have been abscised or removed by herbivores and that does not have any open megasporangiate strobili from which any mature seeds have abscised.
Phenobase preferred label: abscised megasporangiate strobilus or seed absent
Equivalent to: (PPO:0002002 that RO:0000080 some (PO:0000003 and not (PPO:0000005 some (PPO:0001064 or PPO:0001024))) and PPO:0000009 only (not (PPO:0000005 some (PPO:0001064 or PPO:0001024))))
Comments: This only includes megasporangiate strobili or seeds that have recently abscised within the last growing season.

Label: ripening megasporangiate strobilus presence
Text definition: A plant structure presence that represents whether a ripening megasporangiate strobilus is present or absent on a whole plant.

Label: ripe megasporangiate strobilus presence
Text definition: A plant structure presence that represents whether a ripe megasporangiate strobilus is present or absent on a whole plant.

Label: ripening megasporangiate strobilus present
Text definition: A ripening megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that has at least one ripening megasporangiate strobilus as part

Label: ripe megasporangiate strobilus present
Text definition: A ripe megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that has at least one ripe megasporangiate strobilus as part

Label: ripening megasporangiate strobilus absent
Text definition: A ripening megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that does not have a ripening megasporangiate strobilus as part

Label: ripe megasporangiate strobilus absent
Text definition: A ripe megasporangiate strobilus presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that does not have a ripe megasporangiate strobilus as part

Label: ripening fruit presence
Text definition: A plant structure presence that represents whether a ripening fruit is present or absent on a whole plant.
Comments: The number of ripening fruit can be 0 or more.

Label: unripe fruit presence
Text definition: A plant structure presence that represents whether a unripe fruit is present or absent on a whole plant.
Comments: The number of unripe fruit can be 0 or more.

Label: ripening fruit present
Text definition: A ripening fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that has at least one ripening fruit as part

Label: unripe fruit present
Text definition: A unripe fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that has at least one unripe fruit as part

Label: ripening fruit absent
Text definition: A ripening fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that does not have a ripening fruit as part

Label: unripe fruit absent
Text definition: A unripe fruit presence trait that is a quality of a whole plant that does not have a unripe fruit as part
